title: Mozart - The Very Best of Mozart (Various, 2005)
description:
The Very Best of Mozart (2005)

		Composer: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart (1756-1791)



			Composition / (Performers):


1	Serenade No. 13 in G major, K. 525, "Eine kleine Nachtmusik": I. Allegro
	 (Petter Sundkvist / Swedish Chamber Orchestra)
	
2	Horn Concerto No. 4 in E flat major, K. 495, III. Rondo - Allegro vivace 
	 (Jozef Kopelman / Capella Istropolitana / Milos Stevove)
	
3	Cosi fan tutte, K. 588, Act I: Soave sia il vento
	 (Johannes Wildner / Capella Istropolitana / Soloists)
	
4	Violin Sonata No. 26 in B flat major, K. 378: II. Andantino sostenuto e cantabile
	 (Takako Nishizaki / Jeno Jando)
	
5	Requiem in D minor, K. 626: Sequence: V. Confutatis maledictis - Sequence: VI. Lacrimosa dies illa
	 (Morten Schuldt-Jensen / Leipzig Chamber Orchestra / Gewandhaus Chamber Choir)
	
6	Symphony No. 40 in G minor, K. 550: I. Molto allegro
	 (Barry Wordsworth / Capella Istropolitana)
	
7	String Quartet No. 17 in B flat major, K. 458, "Hunt": II. Minuetto: Moderato
	 (Eder Quartet)
	
8	Don Giovanni, K. 527, Act I: La ci darem la mano
	 (Johannes Wildner / Capella Istropolitana / Soloists)
	
9	3 German Dances, K. 605: No. 3 in C major, "Die Schlittenfahrt" (Sleigh Ride)
	 (Johannes Wildner / Capella Istropolitana)
	
10	Piano Concerto No. 20 in D minor, K. 466: III. Rondo: Allegro assai
	 (Andras Ligeti / Concentus Hungaricus / Jeno Jando)
	
11	Le nozze di Figaro, K. 492, Act II: Voi, che sapete
	 (Michael Halasz / Nicolaus Esterhazy Sinfonia / Michelle Breedt)
	
12	Symphony No. 25 in G minor, K. 183: I. Allegro con brio
	 (Barry Wordsworth / Capella Istropolitana)
	
13	Ave verum corpus in D major, K. 618
	 (Johannes Wildner / Camerata Cassovia / Kosice Teachers' Choir)
	
14	Le nozze di Figaro, K. 492, Act I: Overture
	 (Michael Halasz / Nicolaus Esterhazy Sinfonia)
	
15	Clarinet Concerto in A major, K. 622: II. Adagio
	 (Johannes Wildner / Vienna Mozart Academy / Ernst Ottensamer)
	
16	Mass No. 18 in C minor, K. 427, "Great": Kyrie
	 (Michael Halasz / Nicolaus Esterhazy Sinfonia / Hungarian Radio Choir / Viktoria Loukianetz)
	
17	Piano Concerto No. 21 in C major, "Elvira Madigan": II. Andante
	 (Andras Ligeti / Concentus Hungaricus / Jeno Jando)
	
18	Symphony No. 41 in C major, K. 551, "Jupiter": IV. Molto allegro
	 (Barry Wordsworth / Capella Istropolitana)
	
19	Die ZauberflÃƒÂ¶te, K. 620, Act II: Der HÃƒÂ¶lle Rache, "Queen of the Night"
	 (Johannes Wildner / Capella Istropolitana / Donna Robin)
	
20	Piano Sonata No. 11 in A major, K. 331: III. Rondo alla turca: Allegretto
	 (Jeno Jando)
	
21	Concerto for Flute & Harp in C major, K. 299: II. Andantino
	 (Katarina Andreasson / Swedish Chamber Orchestra / Patrick Gallois / Fabrice Pierre / Roderick Shaw)
	
22	Serenade No. 10 in B flat major, K. 361, "Gran Partita": III. Menuetto
	 (German Wind Soloists)
	
23	Clarinet Quintet in A major, K. 581, "Stadler": II. Larghetto
	 (Danubius Quartet / Jozsef Balogh)
	
24	Violin Concerto No. 5 in A major, K. 219, "Turkish": III. Rondo: Tempo di minuetto
	 (Stephen Gunzenhauser / Capella Istropolitana / Takako Nishizaki)
	




		"The Very Best of Mozart", retail 2005.

This is the 2CD "very best of" compilation from the naxos series with the cartoonish abomination album covers. The original front cover album art is obviously not embedded, but replaced with decent custom 600x600.

Codec profile is Opus VBR at bitrate 96 (libopus 1.1),
genre marked as Classical - and tracks are as always tagged and pretty.

				enjoy ! /dussin
